body_html:
In addition to that and helpers tending to rot: I think we can safely remove the ApplicationHelper module as it seems not to be used: 😹

❯ ag time_span_array
app/helpers/application_form_helper.rb
3:  def time_span_array

spec/helpers/application_form_helper_spec.rb
4:  describe '.time_span_array' do
6:      expect(time_span_array.size).to eq(6)
body_text:
In addition to that and helpers tending to rot: I think we can safely remove the ApplicationHelper module as it seems not to be used: 😹
❯ ag time_span_array
app/helpers/application_form_helper.rb
3:  def time_span_array

spec/helpers/application_form_helper_spec.rb
4:  describe '.time_span_array' do
6:      expect(time_span_array.size).to eq(6)
body:
In addition to that and helpers tending to rot: I think we can safely remove the `ApplicationHelper` module as it seems not to be used: 😹 
```bash
❯ ag time_span_array
app/helpers/application_form_helper.rb
3:  def time_span_array

spec/helpers/application_form_helper_spec.rb
4:  describe '.time_span_array' do
6:      expect(time_span_array.size).to eq(6)
```
